data.title: Full-cycle Array
data.statement:
Given an input array of size [[N]], your task is to <<determine if it is a "Full-cycle array".>>

An array is said to be a "Full-cycle array" if - starting at any index of the array and jumping the number of elements indicated by the value in the current cell - every element of the array is visited exactly once before landing back on the starting index.

NB : If a jump goes out of the array bounds, wrap it over to the other side of the array.
Considering a jump of {{-1}} at index {{0}}, it then goes to the last element of the input array.
Similarly, a jump of {{1}} at index {{N-1}} goes to the first element of the input array.

<<For example>> with <<[[N]]=5>> and the input array <<[1, 2, 2, -1, 1]>>, the answer should be {{True}}. 
    - Starting from index 0, you run through the following indexes {0, 1, 3, 2, 4, 0}
    - Starting from index 3, you run through the following indexes {3, 2, 4, 0, 1, 3}
    - and so on...

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Given an input array of size N, your task is to determine if it is a "Full-cycle array".

An array is said to be a "Full-cycle array" if - starting at any index of the array and jumping the number of elements indicated by the value in the current cell - every element of the array is visited exactly once before landing back on the starting index.

NB : If a jump goes out of the array bounds, wrap it over to the other side of the array.
Considering a jump of -1 at index 0, it then goes to the last element of the input array.
Similarly, a jump of 1 at index N-1 goes to the first element of the input array.

For example with N=5 and the input array [1, 2, 2, -1, 1], the answer should be True.
- Starting from index 0, you run through the following indexes {0, 1, 3, 2, 4, 0}
- Starting from index 3, you run through the following indexes {3, 2, 4, 0, 1, 3}
- and so on...
Input
Line 1: A positive integer N representing the size of the array.
Line 2: N Space-separated integer values of the array to check.
Output
True if the input array is a Full-cycle array, False otherwise.
Constraints
0 < N < 20
-1000 < Vi < 1000
Example
Input
5
1 2 2 -1 1
Output
True
